simulateStep(Vector, Vector) - Method in class Pacman.Model.Ghost

Stops/Pauses the game, so it can be resumed later
stop() - Method in class Pacman.Model.GameCharacter
This starts the character, which only means that the state changes, the thread continues to run.
stop() - Method in class Pacman.Model.Ghost
Sets active to false so the thread doesn't keep moving the ghost.
stop() - Method in class Pacman.Model.Player
Sets active to false so the thread doesn't keep moving the player
